page.title: 14Ogbourne Pubs
page.content: There are 2 pubs in Obourne St George. The New Inn is easier to get to and is easier to park your car,so most people go there.You have to cross a busy road to get to the Robin Hood. Friday night, Saturday and Sunday midday are the busiest times for the pubs,with about 45 customers mainly from the village but some customers come from Marlborough. Men go mainly on a Saturday and the women go at the weekends. In the New Inn children are allowed to stay with their parents but are not allowed in on their own. The Robin Hood doesn't have a garden. Both pubs serve food as well as drinks and both have a games room.
